description.direction: What direction to group (horizontal or vertical)
description.jusitifyContent: Justify the content to either position (ex. left, center, right)
description.alignItems: Alignment of the content items (ex. center)
description.wrap: Wrap the content (ex. nowrap, wrap, wrap-reverse)
description.flexGrow: Allow to grow the content within the group
description.flexShrink: Allow to shrink the content within the group
description.gap: A number between 1-10 that sets the gap between flexed elements.
description.fluidGrid: Uses flexbox and media queries to determine amount of items per row.
description.columns: Number of items per row. (number between 1-12)
